name: Violet Haunted
description: Steam Release October 21, 2016! Classic JRPG style action with turn based combat. Figure out how to stop an army of darkness despite wielding dark powers yourself. Use the enemies' abilities against them to gain the upper hand.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)  Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution Storage: 500 MB available space
